channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:45 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:45 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 19:41 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 19:41 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 19:02 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 19:02 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
